about_the_company: Net2Source Inc. is an award-winning total workforce solutions company recognized for its accelerated growth with over 5500+ employees globally and operations in 32 countries. They provide staffing solutions and act as career coaches to their consultants.
job_responsibilities: Gathering business requirements and developing functional specifications
Defining test cases and providing user training and support
Implementing technology solutions for major financial institutions
Analyzing datasets using SQL and relational databases
Working on Basel-related projects in credit risks
